author: Tighe McAsey
title: Template tag
question: I cant seem to get the template tag right, when I write the tag for the given template should I use all types encapsulated?
student_answer: If you have an accumulator, encapsulated is redundant; also, check to see that you're including the data types you're using in the function i.e. fn for ???. Also, look at the autograder report: it specifies what you’re lacking (though you’ll have to interpret what it means).
